name: 陳盛有
objective:
1.電路元件
2.電路特性
3.網路方程式
4.穩態分析及頻率響應
5.網路函數：極點及零點
6.雙埠網路分析
7.傅利葉及拉普拉斯轉換
schedule:
1.　　Review of Circuit Theory
2.　　Linear Passive Circuit Analysis
3.　　Tellegen’s Theorem
4.　　Two-Terminal Resistors
5.　　The Concave and Convex Resistors
6.　　Multiterminal Resistors
7.　　Linear Controlled Sources
8.　　Double Load Lines
9.　　Midterm Exam.
10.　　Operational-Amplifier Circuits
11.　　Opamp Circuits Operating in the Linear Region
12.　　Opamp Circuits Operating in the Nonlinear Region
13.　　General Resistive Circuits
14.　　Tableau Equation Formulation
15.　　General Properties of Linear Resistive Circuits
16.　　First-Order Circuits
17.　　First-Order Linear Circuits
18.　　Final Exam.
materials: Chua , Desoer , Koh  Linear and Nonlinear Circuits
